description:
Defender of justice, Bunji Man. Once again, he rounds up Commander Fumi and goes to seek the town for people in need. He then encounters Daichi who is being picked on by some boys at a shop selling sweets; Back at home, Daichi`s mother and Mrs. Gonda are visiting. As Mrs. Gonda discusses her strong child rearing techniques, the topic of conversation turns to their three boys` report cards; On a day off, Bunji and Dad go to a conveyor belt sushi restaurant. Dad, teaching his son about sushi etiquette, proclaims, "You must start with the gyoku!" and "Don`t use chopsticks!" etc.; The Kamohara family`s wishes for Santa Claus to adorn their Christmas tree. A mix of the Japanese holiday, Tanabata, and Christmas. In them, you can see what the family members truly desire.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go Go, Bunji Man 2 / Mothers` Tea Party / Men`s Outing / Desire Tree
いけいけブンジマン2 / 母たちのお茶会 / 男の休日 / 欲望ツリー
